# Electronic Health Records Platform (EHRP) Tender

**Reference Number:** WS3430950409-Doc4437677242

**Notice Type:** Request for Information (RFI)

## Procurement Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites industry stakeholders to review and submit comments on the draft procurement documents for the Electronic Health Records Platform (EHRP) project.

## Project Objective

The objective of the EHRP project is to replace the current Canadian Forces Health Information System (CFHIS) with a modern Electronic Health Record Platform (EHRP). This modernization will enable the Department of National Defence (DND) to improve health information management and reduce administrative costs.

## Solicited Information and Feedback

The PSPC solicits information and feedback from industry on the current ability of Electronic Health Record (EHR) vendors to meet the requirements outlined in the draft procurement documents. Industry stakeholders are invited to review and comment on the documents at their discretion.

## Tender Details

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** March 31, 2026
* **Expected Contract End Date:** February 1, 2036
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** Canada

## Contact Information

For inquiries, please contact Heather Ferrier (SPAC/PSPC) at [heather.ferrier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:heather.ferrier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).
